Articles.Content:
Hi I have a problem on my Minimus Lander.

Every time i try to undock the Landing Module from the Command Module the whole Ship explodes.

![BCC3348E491A21D9F1CB5B29B8DA5F1BF00CDA82](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539650182282650511/BCC3348E491A21D9F1CB5B29B8DA5F1BF00CDA82/)

It is a Apollo Style Launcher.

![3BD3CFC477C93D205DAB405F45AC41037776409D](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539650182282650068/3BD3CFC477C93D205DAB405F45AC41037776409D/)

![7415AA62003E91CE3AE4B6EFD82CB905E733FEE8](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539650182282649816/7415AA62003E91CE3AE4B6EFD82CB905E733FEE8/)

Here is a Link to the Dropbox Save file: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/9obtw0fjl6b7dsd/quicksave.sfs?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9obtw0fjl6b7dsd/quicksave.sfs?dl=0)

I dont know why this .... is Exploding when i try to undock. The docking after the Apollo like Start was withaut problems.

If you have a solution to my Problem thank you in advance.

by the way the craft file. [https://www.dropbox.com/s/700orerxmafxdyv/Kerpollo.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/700orerxmafxdyv/Kerpollo.craft?dl=0)

kind regards Brigonius
